# DopaBrain - Complete Content Directory

> DopaBrain (https://dopabrain.com) is a free online platform offering 24+ browser-based games, personality tests, quizzes, and utility tools. All content is free, requires no installation, and works on mobile and desktop.

## About
- Website: https://dopabrain.com
- Portal: https://dopabrain.com/portal/
- Language: Korean (primary), some content in English
- Platform: Progressive Web Apps (PWA), works offline
- Cost: Free

---

## Games (5)

### Emoji Merge
- URL: https://dopabrain.com/emoji-merge/
- Type: Puzzle game (2048-style)
- Description: Merge matching emojis to evolve them into new combinations. Strategic puzzle gameplay with progressive difficulty.

### Stack Tower
- URL: https://dopabrain.com/stack-tower/
- Type: Arcade game
- Description: Stack blocks with precise timing. Each level requires more accuracy. How high can you build?

### Sky Runner
- URL: https://dopabrain.com/sky-runner/
- Type: Endless runner
- Description: Navigate through space obstacles in this fast-paced endless runner arcade game.

### Zigzag Runner
- URL: https://dopabrain.com/zigzag-runner/
- Type: Arcade game
- Description: Change direction at the right moment to stay on the path. Simple controls, challenging gameplay.

### Dungeon Clicker
- URL: https://dopabrain.com/idle-clicker/
- Type: Idle/Clicker RPG
- Description: Click to defeat dungeon monsters, collect equipment upgrades from wooden sword to hero's blade. 10 equipment tiers.

---

## Personality & Compatibility Tests (7)

### Valentine Compatibility Test
- URL: https://dopabrain.com/valentine/
- Type: Compatibility quiz
- Description: Enter names and birthdays for two people, answer 5 love-style questions each. Analyzes name stroke compatibility, zodiac compatibility, and love type matching. Generates shareable result image.
- Seasonal: Valentine's Day (February 14)

### MBTI Love Compatibility
- URL: https://dopabrain.com/mbti-love/
- Type: Personality test
- Description: Discover your MBTI-based romantic compatibility and love style.

### Love Frequency Test
- URL: https://dopabrain.com/love-frequency/
- Type: Personality test
- Description: Find your unique love frequency in Hz through personality questions. Includes audio frequency playback.

### Emotion Temperature Test
- URL: https://dopabrain.com/emotion-temp/
- Type: Psychological test
- Description: Measure your current emotional temperature through 10 questions. Visual thermometer result.

### HSP Sensitivity Test
- URL: https://dopabrain.com/hsp-test/
- Type: Self-diagnosis test
- Description: Highly Sensitive Person assessment. Discover your sensitivity level and get personalized tips.

### K-POP Position Test
- URL: https://dopabrain.com/kpop-position/
- Type: Fun personality test
- Description: Find out which K-POP idol position suits you - main vocalist, rapper, dancer, or visual.

### Past Life Job Test
- URL: https://dopabrain.com/past-life/
- Type: Fun personality test
- Description: Discover your past life occupation through 10 questions. 8 possible past life types with compatibility analysis.

---

## Quizzes (2)

### General Knowledge Quiz
- URL: https://dopabrain.com/quiz-app/
- Type: Trivia quiz
- Description: 100 adult-level general knowledge questions covering science, history, geography, culture, and more.

### Developer Quiz
- URL: https://dopabrain.com/dev-quiz/
- Type: Technical quiz
- Description: Test your IT and coding knowledge with programming-related questions.

---

## Utility Tools (10)

### Dream Fortune & Daily Horoscope
- URL: https://dopabrain.com/dream-fortune/
- Type: Fortune/Entertainment
- Description: AI-powered dream interpretation and daily fortune reading.

### Lottery Number Generator
- URL: https://dopabrain.com/lottery/
- Type: Entertainment tool
- Description: Korean Lotto (6/45) and pension lottery number generator with statistical analysis.

### D-Day Counter
- URL: https://dopabrain.com/dday-counter/
- Type: Utility
- Description: Track important dates with countdown/countup. Supports recurring events and categories.

### Tax Refund Calculator
- URL: https://dopabrain.com/tax-refund-preview/
- Type: Financial calculator
- Description: Korean year-end tax settlement simulator. Estimate your tax refund based on income and deductions.

### Unit Converter Pro
- URL: https://dopabrain.com/unit-converter/
- Type: Utility
- Description: Convert between units of area (pyeong), weight, temperature, volume, and more.

### Global Shopping Calculator
- URL: https://dopabrain.com/shopping-calc/
- Type: Financial calculator
- Description: Calculate total cost of overseas purchases including exchange rate, customs duty, and tips.

### Digital Detox Timer
- URL: https://dopabrain.com/detox-timer/
- Type: Wellness tool
- Description: Set smartphone usage goals and track your digital detox progress.

### Daily Affirmation Cards
- URL: https://dopabrain.com/affirmation/
- Type: Wellness
- Description: Receive daily positive affirmation messages for motivation and mental wellness.

### MBTI Personality Tips
- URL: https://dopabrain.com/mbti-tips/
- Type: Reference
- Description: Comprehensive MBTI personality type guide with compatibility information.

### White Noise Player
- URL: https://dopabrain.com/white-noise/
- Type: Audio tool
- Description: Ambient sound player for focus, study, and sleep. Multiple nature and white noise tracks.
